title: Margaret Qualley cuts a chic look as she serves as the face of new Celine Essentiels campaign
text:
Margaret Qualley has had quite the year, with her appearance in Quentin Tarantino's latest and her blossoming romance with Pete Davidson.

And now, the Once Upon a Time In Hollywood actress is adding another fashion campaign to her résumé.

The stunning daughter of Andie MacDowell cut a chic look in Celine's latest campaign for their Chaine Maillon Triomphe bag.

Fashionista: Margaret Qualley cut a chic look in Celine's latest campaign for their Chaine Maillon Triomphe bag

The black-and-white shoot features Qualley sporting a gingham blouse with ruffled sleeves, paired with high-waisted jeans.

She carries the handbag over her shoulder featuring a braided chain strap with a metal clasp.

The campaign also features a video entitled Portrait of an Actress, showing the 24-year-old modeling the bag.

Margaret has had a busy season.

She's recently been filming a secret project with director Olivia Wilde, following her directorial debut with this year's Booksmart.

Bag lady: The black-and-white shoot features Qualley sporting a gingham blouse with ruffled sleeves, paired with high-waisted jeans, as she carries the handbag over her shoulder

Qualley took to Instagram with a photo of herself hugging Wilde on set in New York City.

The starlet's personal life has also been receiving buzz, as she's been romantically linked with Saturday Night Live star Pete Davidson.

Her mom Andie MacDowell recently confirmed the two are dating, describing it as a 'beautiful relationship.'

Movie star: She's recently been filming a secret project with director Olivia Wilde, following her directorial debut with this year's Booksmart

Best director ever: Qualley took to Instagram with a photo of herself hugging Wilde on set in New York City

The Groundhog Day actress told People: 'She has a beautiful relationship with him but I don't want to step on her relationship too much. They have a nice relationship.'

But MacDowell admits she hasn't met her daughter's boyfriend just yet: 'I FaceTimed with Pete the other day or no, she took a video of me to send to Pete that's what it was.'

The happy couple has frequently been spotted out and about together, putting on an affectionate display.

Early last month, they were seen arriving together at the Marco Polo Airport in Venice.

It's official: Mom Andie MacDowell recently confirmed Qualley is dating Pete Davidson, describing it as a 'beautiful relationship'

Movie premiere: On August 30, Davidson and Qualley attended the premiere of her film Seberg at the Venice Film Festival

They next day, they attended the premiere of her film Seberg at the Venice Film Festival.

Davidson sat directly behind Qualley as she was perched front row next to co-star Anthony Mackie.

For Labor Day, they were spotted holding hands as they went out to explore the romantic Italian city.
description: She's recently been filming a secret project with director Olivia Wilde, following her directorial debut with this year's Booksmart. Qualley took to Instagram with photos from set.
